name: SmileBetter
description: This extension redirects you to the smile.amazon.com every time you visit an Amazon page. Amazon Smile is Amazon's charity program to non-profit organizations. Every time you purchase something through smile.amazon.com, Amazon donates 0.05% of its revenue to the organization of your choice. Learn more at: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/pd/ref=smi_se_saas_lpd_spd
